title: Learner Behavior Analysis in Distance Learning: Utilizing Social Network Analysis (SNA)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operation of online learning platforms (LMS) and foundational network analysis concepts
context.additional_context: A course strengthening data-driven decision-making skills to analyze social interaction patterns in virtual learning environments via VR simulations and improve learner engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can construct learner interaction networks based on LMS clickstream data
Learners interpret learner behavior patterns using SNA metrics (centrality, density, etc.) and propose educational improvement measures
Learners analyze data collected in VR simulation environments to design customized support strategies for different learner types
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
